ch0282_00_ballguy/0101_0701_01_10:
I’ve been wanting to see you,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]!
ch0282_00_ballguy/0101_0701_02_10:
As always, I want to cheer you on as
a mascot!
ch0282_00_ballguy/7101_0701_01_10:
Have you ever heard of handmade Poké Balls that
are made from Apricorns, which are a special kind
of Berry?
ch0282_00_ballguy/7101_0701_02_10:
They’re considered a rarity among
Poké Ball collectors!
ch0282_00_ballguy/7102_0701_01_10:
There are so many different types of Poké Balls
all over the world...
ch0282_00_ballguy/7102_0701_02_10:
I’m so excited about what kinds of Poké Balls will
be invented in the future!
ch0282_00_ballguy/7103_0701_01_10:
If there’s anything you want to know about
Poké Balls, I can teach you!
ch0282_00_ballguy/7103_0701_02_10:
If you want to learn about Poké Balls, you can
leave it to me—the Ball Guy!
ch0282_00_ballguy/7104_0701_01_10:
Do you have any particular way you prefer to
throw Poké Balls?
ch0282_00_ballguy/7104_0701_02_10:
You can see a Trainer’s personality in how they
throw! It’s interesting!
ch0282_00_ballguy/7105_0701_01_10:
Do you have a favorite kind of Poké Ball,
[Name:PlayerNickname ]?
ch0282_00_ballguy/7105_0701_03_10: ALL of them! They’re all so unique and wonderful!
ch0282_00_ballguy/1701_0701_01_10:
Hey there! Thanks for rolling by to have a chat
with your mate—the Ball Guy!
ch0282_00_ballguy/1701_0701_02_10:
As a sign of our friendship, let me give you
something wonderful!
ch0282_00_ballguy/2501_0701_01_10:
Hey, listen to this! Lately, more children have been
cheering me on!
ch0282_00_ballguy/2501_0701_02_10: *sob* I’m so touched, it’s making me cry...
ch0282_00_ballguy/2501_0702_01_10:
I hope to become a true mascot everyone
can love!
ch0282_00_ballguy/2501_0702_02_10:
That’s why I’m going to continue doing
what I do as a mascot!
ch0282_00_ballguy/2501_0702_03_10:
One day, I may even get to be an official
mascot...
ch0282_00_ballguy/2511_0701_01_10:
I brought my collection with me to Pasio so I can
give everyone Poké Balls!
ch0282_00_ballguy/2511_0701_02_10:
But...there aren’t any wild Pokémon here
on Pasio...
ch0282_00_ballguy/2511_0701_03_10:
I’ll just have to work hard and cheer everyone
on instead!
ch0282_00_ballguy/2511_0702_01_10:
I’ve just had an incredi-ball idea! What if I made
a Poké Ball that’s exclusive to Pasio?
ch0282_00_ballguy/2511_0702_02_10: It could be a souvenir that we give to everyone!
ch0282_00_ballguy/2511_0702_03_10:
To do that, first I’ll have to become closer friends
with Lear!
ch0282_00_ballguy/3001_0701_01_10:
When you’re sleepy, some exercise can wake you
up! How do you feel about ballroom dancing?
ch0282_00_ballguy/3003_0701_01_10:
Having an afternoon snack? I’ve got some treats
shaped like Poké Balls!
ch0282_00_ballguy/3005_0701_01_10:
It’s dark already. Hey, if you’re a fan of the
nighttime, then Dusk Balls are the ones for you!
